Title: Andhadhun
Writer: Arijit Biswas, Yogesh Chandekar, Sriram Raghavan, Hemanth Rao, Pooja Ladha Surti
Actors: Ayushmann Khurrana, Tabu, Radhika Apte, Anil Dhawan
Plot: A series of mysterious events changes the life of a blind pianist who now must report a crime that was actually never witnessed by him.
